text: Best of the Rainmakers is a compilation album by The Rainmakers, released in 1993.Best of the Rainmakers| The Rainmakers Discogs == Track listing == All tracks written by Bob Walkenhorst except where noted. # "Downstream" – 3:31 # "Spend It on Love" – 2:54 # "The Wages of Sin" – 3:39 # "Small Circles" – 4:10 # "Nobody Knows" (Steve Phillips) – 3:32 # "Reckoning Day" – 3:20 # "Snakedance" – 3:58 # "Kisses from St. Louis" – 2:30 # "Long Gone Long" (solo acoustic) – 3:45 # "Let My People Go-Go" – 3:38 # "Hoo Dee Hoo" – 4:28 # "Rocking Around" – 3:31 # " No Romance" (Steve Phillips) – 3:18 # "Shiny Shiny" – 2:52 # "Information" (Alan Clutter) – 4:49 # "The Lakeview Man" – 3:45 # "Big Fat Blonde" – 2:56 # "Johnny Reb" (live acoustic) – 2:35 == Personnel == === The Rainmakers === *Bob Walkenhorst – lead vocals, guitar, keyboards *Rich Ruth – bass guitar, vocals *Steve Phillips – lead guitar, vocals *Pat Tomek – drums == References == Category:1993 compilation albums Category:Mercury Records compilation albums Category:The Rainmakers (band) albums
title: The Best of the Rainmakers
